about_the_game:
This is a co-op puzzle game centered around time control and object manipulation.
The abandoned reassembling laboratory is experiencing anomalies, with space and time being distorted. Players will take on the roles of the missing person, Sophia, and the investigator, Thirteen, as they together uncover the secrets of the laboratory.

Please note that this game requires both a keyboard and a gamepad to play.

Game Features

The game design revolves around "character abilities" and "alterations". Both players must utilize each other's abilities to cooperate and use objects in the levels to help each other progress. The levels' complexity and enjoyment will increase as the game progresses, allowing players to experience the game design centered around "alterations".


Cooperative level design for two players, using remote multiplayer to invite friends to play together and experience levels and puzzles specifically designed for cooperative play, testing their synergy and cooperation.

Character Abilities

Player 1, Sofia, has the ability to control time and manipulate recorded events, serving as the logical puzzle solver.


Player 2, Thirteen, can alter objects using their energy, turning special materials into ghostly states, and even transforming themselves into energy to access unique abilities.
